```{r setup}
devtools::load_all()
library(ggplot2)
```

# 太平洋中区ヒラメ（活魚）入荷数量
```{r, fig.height = 5, fig.width = 9}
chuku <- load_price() %>%
  dplyr::filter(Location %in% c("千葉", "神奈川", "静岡", "愛知", "三重")) %>%
  tidyr::drop_na(Avg_price)

# Live hirame from chuku

ggplot(chuku %>% dplyr::filter(Meigara == "Live"),
       aes(x = Date, y = Quantity, color = Location)) +
geom_line() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(y = "入荷数量(kg)")
```

# 太平洋中区ヒラメ（鮮魚）入荷数量
